thread.title: Gwyneth Paltrow's thrilled her daughter likes Taylor Swift as 'she doesn't get naked'
thread.title_full: Gossip | Gwyneth Paltrow's thrilled her daughter likes Taylor Swift as 'she doesn't get naked' - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gwyneth Paltrow's thrilled her daughter likes Taylor Swift as 'she doesn't get naked'
text:
No doubt Taylor does get naked, just in her own time, "not on the red carpet." And if she did choose to get naked on the red carpet, that's her choice - but Gwyneth Paltrow's happy she doesn't for her daughter Apple's sake.
Speaking at Variety‘s Power of Women luncheon at the Beverly Wilshire in Beverly Hills on Friday, alongside Salma Hayek and many others (scroll yisserselves down to see more), the actress said of her 11-year-old daughter with Chris Martin: "She loves Taylor Swift, and for me, that’s such a great sign. Taylor is a girl who's incredibly talented. She writes her own music. She's not naked on the red carpet. She’s an incredibly astute businesswoman, so with role models like that, [Apple] can’t go wrong."
The 43-year-old actress / goop entrepreneur added: "I really think that that generation is going to do something very special. Those girls, they are so in their power. They are absolutely shameless in terms of their femininity, and I think we’re on the verge of something really exciting."
Others at the event as well as Salma included Reese Witherspoon, Lisa Kudrow, Jamie King, Jenna Dewan Tatum, Rosie Huntington Whitely, Anna Kendrick and Thandie Newton.
